description._description: A description to keep track of this DNS Zone.

refresh_sec._description: Time interval before the DNS Zone should be refreshed, in seconds.

retry_sec._description: Time interval that should elapse before a failed refresh should be retried, in seconds.

expire_sec._description: Time value that specifies the upper limit on the time interval that can elapse before the DNS Zone is no longer authoritative, in seconds.

ttl_sec._description:
Time interval that the resource record may be cached before
  it should be discarded, in seconds.

status._description: The status of the DNS Zone it can be disabled, active, or edit_mode.

master_ips._description: An array of IP addresses for this DNS Zone.

axfr_ips._description: An array of IP addresses allowed to AXFR the entire DNS Zone.

display_group._description: A display group to keep track of this DNS Zone.

status.active: Turn on serving of this DNS Zone.
status.disabled: Turn off serving of this DNS Zone.
status.edit_mode: Use this mode while making edits.

dnszone_type.slave: A secondary DNS zone which gets its updates from a master DNS zone.
